name: Flippy Kenney: A physics ragdoll adventure.
name_original: Flippy Kenney: A physics ragdoll adventure.
description:
Flippy Kenney is a physics-ragdoll adventure game.

Made for Kenney Jam 2021 with the theme of: Rotation.

A short slapstick adventure of a dummy.

It is about the dummy, "Kenney", trying to reach the goal (or flag) by the help of the cursor, and that's you player.

Try to put your cursor towards Kenney and watch it fly!

Controls:

  • Cursor - making Kenney fly
  • R - restart the game
  • Escape - quitting the game during the gameplay.

Relation with the theme:

The game features the dummy that flies, and rotates airborne.

Inspiration:

It was inspired by the number of games that has "space" as their mechanic in this jam. So it tries to be unique.

Credit:

All assets(sounds, fonts, and sprites) are made by Kenney (kenney.nl)

Other pre-made assets(codes and other sprites) were made by me before the jam. 

Further Notice:

"Flippy Kenney" isn't affiliated with kenney.nl

Kenney was used as the name for the dummy because all the assets were taken from the said website.
